p1:
Hi, I'm Mitchell. I am a recent graduate from the Southern Insititute of Technology where I gained a Bachelor of Information Technology
My skills and interests lie in all areas of programming including but not limited to web and mobile applications and desktop development. I enjoy learning new languages and further improving my knowledge and skills in languages I am already familiar with.
p2:
I have experience in developing for a range of platforms and frameworks including Flutter, C# and React-JS.
 I am seeking a full-time permanent position with a company that will support and nurture my talents during my IT journey.
